title: s-a-t-o-s-h-i-c-u-s
author: s-a-t-o-s-h-i-c-u-s
content: Cyberyen [C¬•]The Dark Side of the Moon¬†üåö- intro -http://youtu.be/p5Ac7ap_MAY@.. I didn‚Äôt want my obituary to be, ‚ÄúHe died getting a quote on the yen.‚ÄùCyberyen is a challenge to everything that is happening in crypto today.A challenge to all the newfangled blockchains under the centralized control of a handful of infantile people who grew up on "HelloKitty". And also to all CEXs that involve people in speculative activities, pumping out money with the help of actively popularizing exchange tools.‚Ä®Money cannot belong to one or some group of people, money has always been the nodes of relationships between peoples, a measure lying on the scales on the right and left sides, to establish harmony and balance.‚Ä®You were given a vector for the development of a decentralised world, but you turned around and ran after fake brilliance. Don‚Äôt bottle yourself in smart contracts. Take back your freedom, stop listening to any specialists with limited and populist knowledge.POW+radio is the solution.‚Ä®Raise nodes wherever possible, Connect nodes together with a signal, Envelop the planet. Here is your freedom!‚Ä®‚Ä®‚Ä®Cyberyen is a hybrid cryptocurrency grown from the Litecoin MWEB fork with grafted Dogecoin block parameters.- specification -Algorithm: Scrypt with AuxPoWNo target limit of total supplyBlock Time: 60 SecondsPremine: Noneblock 1-99,000 =¬†1,000,000 C¬• Rewardblock ‚â§ 144,999 =¬†500,000 C¬• Rewardblock ‚â§ 199,999 =¬†250,000 C¬• Rewardblock ‚â§ 299,999 =¬†125,000 C¬• Rewardblock ‚â§ 399,999 =¬†62,500 C¬• Rewardblock ‚â§ 499,999 =¬†31,250 C¬• Rewardblock ‚â§ 599,999 =¬†15,625 C¬• Rewardblock ‚â• 600,000 =¬†10,000 C¬• Reward- website -http://cyberyen.org/- source -https://github.com/cyberyen/cyberyen/@: Impressed by you cyberbrothersüß°. ‚Ä®¬† ¬† ¬† ¬† ¬†I think you understood everything,‚Ä®¬† ¬† ¬†It‚Äôs time for me to move on..

comments.author: SpeedyDale08
comments.body: Quote from: FlaJa on August 27, 2022, 03:36:29 PMNo wallet? No mining?I have no idea how to compile a wallet

comments.author: elmo40
comments.created_time: August 29, 2022, 03:29:19 AMLast edit: September 04, 2022, 03:35:46 PM by elmo40
comments.body: Well, there goes diff on another Scrypt coin.;-)AuxPow would be a nice touch but it is not in the code. I notice a tab in the explorer for Masternode, must be a default setting that you forgot to un-check. This may confuse some people.

comments.author: MiningCoinsPool
comments.created_time: August 29, 2022, 08:09:04 PMLast edit: August 29, 2022, 08:42:06 PM by MiningCoinsPool
comments.body: Careful there is a little mistake on the max supply, it is not infinite but limited because in the validation.cpp file, there is still the halving lines to enable it.So the max supply is actually 161,186,999,998. See attached file for more detailsFirst lines with blue background, those are the ones mentioned manually in the validation.cpp file at subsidy information.The lines below that. from the orange background one, those are the ones made automatically from the halving set to be every 100,000 blocks.It ends up with a max supply of 161,186,999,998.137 coins, for a mining phase of approximately 7 years, with a block time of 1 minute (approximately for the time). And a total of 3,699,999 blocks with new generated coins.

comments.author: ruaxxx
comments.body: Quote from: elmo40 on August 29, 2022, 03:29:19 AMWell, there goes diff on another Scrypt coin.;-)AuxPow would be a nice touch but it is not in the code. I notice a tab in the explorer for Masternode, must be a default setting that you forgot to un-check. This may confuse some people.Hello¬† Elmo40 ¬†¬†we are not able to synchronize the wallets... the last transaction is yours... did you have any problems? Or can you help to understand where the problem is? ¬†¬†thanks :-)

comments.author: elmo40
comments.body: You can't sync? Or your wallet is out of date? See what your peers, and explorer is at. If you match, then you are in sync, just out of date due to no miners.

comments.author: ruaxxx
comments.body: Community attention!The version of the code published on 27/08/2022 contained bugs that caused the network to become out of sync.Due to the unavailability of the author, and ignoring the current situation, we decided to make several corrections to the Cyberyen Core code and restart the network.Fixes:¬†‚ÅÉ unlock consensus params in chinparams.cpp;¬†‚ÅÉ adding KGW and DGW in pow.cpp (taken from dashpay). As it turned out, there are many owners of ‚Äúdormant‚Äù Scrypt ASIC miners in the crypto community who have lost their relevance.During the discussion, the idea arose to make Cyberyen available to solo miners, that is, Scrypt ASIC owners whose equipment has become unprofitable for mining coins with high difficulty.We would like to finalize the Cyberyen code where any Scrypt ASIC could participate in a live block search competition and where mining pools would lose their relevance.We ask the community to join us and take part in solving this design.Cyberyen is open to everyone who wants to participate in the development of the project.https://matrix.to/#/#cyberyen:matrix.orghttps://github.com/cyberyen/cyberyen

comments.author: ruaxxx
comments.body: Hello people!We need help to integrate Guix? Anyone to help us ?We have this next Steps :1. Guix; 2. Mweb Explorer; 3. WalletsIf anyone like to contribute :https://matrix.to/#/#cyberyen:matrix.orgCyberyen Team

comments.author: elmo40
comments.body: Is the chain going to have to restart with all these changes?

comments.author: ruaxxx
comments.body: The network will restart tomorrow.These tasks will be added as development progresses, the main bugs are fixed, the network is stable

comments.author: elmo40
comments.created_time: January 21, 2023, 10:11:42 PMLast edit: January 21, 2023, 10:22:29 PM by elmo40
comments.body: With a restart that means new checkpoints, and new code release?Any thoughts on hybrid? PoW+PoS?Plus, I didn't see any AuxPow in the original code. Which coin are you using as the base code? Dingocoin and Canada eCoin are both Scrypt with AuxPow.

comments.author: maxtra
comments.body: What specific mechanisms does Cyberyen propose to use in order to challenge the current state of centralized control and speculative activities in the cryptocurrency market, and how does it plan to achieve a decentralized and harmonious balance in financial relationships between individuals and groups?

comments.author: ruaxxx
comments.body: Hello elmo40Base code is Litecoin v0.21.2.1. AuxPow is not activated, but you can combine cyberyen mining with other Scrypt coins that use the AuxPow function.Make a new GitHub issue with all your suggestions for improving the code.Quote from: elmo40 on January 21, 2023, 10:11:42 PMWith a restart that means new checkpoints, and new code release?Any thoughts on hybrid? PoW+PoS?Plus, I didn't see any AuxPow in the original code. Which coin are you using as the base code? Dingocoin and Canada eCoin are both Scrypt with AuxPow.
